Item Class: Amulets
Rarity: Rare
Ghoul Noose
Lunar Amulet
--------
Requires: Level 60
--------
Item Level: 82
--------
Allocates Endless Blizzard (enchant)
--------
+27 to maximum Energy Shield (implicit)
--------
+161 to maximum Mana
+50 to Spirit
16% increased Rarity of Items found
+3 to Level of all Spell Skills
16% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
23% increased Critical Damage Bonus (desecrated)
